tool.name: Trim otutable

param.name: min_otu_size
param.label: Minimum total size for an OTU

param.name: min_otu_freq
param.label: Minimum size for an OTU as a fraction of all OTUs (0.0005 = 0.05%)

tool.help:
-Minimal sample size Default 0. Samples with total count less than this are deleted.
-Minimum count Default 0. Minimum count. Counts less than this are set to zero.
-Minimum frequency Default 0.0. Minimum frequency, defined as count divided by total sample size. Counts smaller than this are set to zero.
-Minimum total size for an OTU Default 0. Minimum total size for an OTU. OTUs smaller than this are deleted.
-mMinimum size for an OTU as a fraction of all OTUs Default 0.0. Minimum size for an OTU as a fraction of all OTUs. OTUs smaller than this are deleted.
